meanings.sent1: The skullduggery of the con artist left many people penniless.
meanings.sent2: Politicians were caught engaging in skullduggery to win the election.
meanings.sent3: The magician's skullduggery made the audience gasp in disbelief.
meanings.sent4: Her skullduggery was like a shadow lurking in the corners of trust.
meanings.sent5: The detective uncovered a web of skullduggery that shocked the small town.

meanings.sent1: The skullduggery of the prankster fooled everyone at the party.
meanings.sent2: The spy's skullduggery was finally exposed by his own carelessness.
meanings.sent3: The children's skullduggery in hiding the cookies was quickly discovered.
meanings.sent4: The skullduggery of the illusionist mesmerized the audience.
meanings.sent5: His skullduggery was a tangled web that ensnared the unwary.
